Class ClientSession

java.lang.Object
Client.ClientSession
public class ClientSession extends Object
Manages the client-side session state for the Bistro application.

This class holds shared static data related to the current client connection, user role, identity (subscriber or guest), and server configuration.

Acts as a central access point for a single BistroClient instance and allows switching the active UI receiver without reconnecting.

      public ClientSession()

  • Method Details

    • configure

      public static void configure(String host, int port)
      Configures the server connection parameters.
      Parameters:
      host - server hostname or IP address
      port - server port number

    • getSubscriberEmail

      public static String getSubscriberEmail()
      Returns the cached subscriber email address for the current terminal subscriber session.

      This value is filled when the subscriber is identified (via QR resolve or login) and is kept in ClientSession so it survives navigation between screens (e.g., Pay Bill â†’ Back).

      Returns:
      subscriber email, or an empty string if not loaded/unknown.

    • setSubscriberEmail

      public static void setSubscriberEmail(String email)
      Sets (caches) the subscriber email address for the current terminal subscriber session.

      The value is normalized:

      • null becomes an empty string.
      • Leading/trailing whitespace is trimmed.
      Parameters:
      email - subscriber email to store; may be null.

    • getSubscriberPhone

      public static String getSubscriberPhone()
      Returns the cached subscriber phone number for the current terminal subscriber session.

      This value is filled when the subscriber is identified and is stored in ClientSession to survive UI navigation.

      Returns:
      subscriber phone number, or an empty string if not loaded/unknown.

    • setSubscriberPhone

      public static void setSubscriberPhone(String phone)
      Sets (caches) the subscriber phone number for the current terminal subscriber session.

      The value is normalized:

      • null becomes an empty string.
      • Leading/trailing whitespace is trimmed.
      Parameters:
      phone - subscriber phone number to store; may be null.

    • clearSubscriberContact

      public static void clearSubscriberContact()
      Clears any cached subscriber contact details (email and phone) from ClientSession.

      This should be called when leaving subscriber mode or logging out, to avoid leaking subscriber contact details into a future session on the terminal.

    • getClient

      public static BistroClient getClient()
      Returns the shared client instance.
      Returns:
      the current BistroClient, or null if not yet created

    • setRole

      public static void setRole(String r)
      Sets the current user role.
      Parameters:
      r - user role (e.g., SUBSCRIBER or CUSTOMER)

    • getRole

      public static String getRole()
      Returns the current user role.
      Returns:
      user role string

    • setUsername

      public static void setUsername(String u)
      Sets the username of the current subscriber user.
      Parameters:
      u - subscriber username

    • getUsername

      public static String getUsername()
      Returns the username of the current subscriber user.
      Returns:
      username string

    • getMemberCode

      public static String getMemberCode()
      Returns the subscriber member code.
      Returns:
      member code, or null if not set

    • setMemberCode

      public static void setMemberCode(String code)
      Sets the subscriber member code.
      Parameters:
      code - subscriber primary key (member_code)

    • getGuestEmail

      public static String getGuestEmail()
      Returns the guest customer's email address.
      Returns:
      guest email, or null if not set

    • setGuestEmail

      public static void setGuestEmail(String email)
      Sets the guest customer's email address.
      Parameters:
      email - guest email

    • getGuestPhone

      public static String getGuestPhone()
      Returns the guest customer's phone number.
      Returns:
      guest phone number, or null if not set

    • setGuestPhone

      public static void setGuestPhone(String phone)
      Sets the guest customer's phone number.
      Parameters:
      phone - guest phone number

    • connect

      public static void connect(ClientUI ui) throws Exception
      Creates or reuses a single client connection and binds it to the given UI.

      If a client already exists, the UI receiver is updated instead of creating a new connection.

      Parameters:
      ui - the UI instance to receive client callbacks
      Throws:
      Exception - if the connection cannot be opened

    • bindUI

      public static void bindUI(ClientUI ui)
      Binds a new UI receiver to the existing client connection.
      Parameters:
      ui - the UI instance to receive callbacks

    • disconnect

      public static void disconnect()
      Disconnects the client from the server if a connection exists.

    • clearGuestIdentity

      public static void clearGuestIdentity()
      Clears stored guest customer identity information (email and phone).

    • clearAllIdentity

      public static void clearAllIdentity()
      Clears all stored session identity information, including role, subscriber data, and guest contact details.
